name: Velvet Defender
description:
Greetings everyone!

You can use a keyboard or a gamepad as a controller.

For keyboard users, use WASD or the arrow keys as navigation controllers.

For gamepad users, use the left stick to control your ship.

Shoot as many enemy ships as you can while dodging the terrain obstacles and enemy ships.

Press the spacebar to restart the game level at any time.

This game is a requirement in our class. This game is for educational purposes only. All credits for Shoji Meguro and Atlus Co., Ltd.

OST Used:

The Poem of Everyone's Souls - Shoji Meguro

The Battle for Everyone's Souls - Shoji Meguro
